participating-org.narrative: Butterfly Works is a social design studio with the overall aim to alleviate poverty in DAC-listed countries. BW creates concepts, programmes, and projects with a strong emphasis on developing creativity, entrepeneurship and improvement of social and economic conditions. BW is an IMPACT alliance partner under the MSF-II financing.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to a sustainable livelihood
